query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: Data Management Plan (DMP) which will cover data management methodology including project wide database, data standards, verification and reuse strategy, curation, preservation using the HORIZON EUROPE online manual. The DMP will be updated over the course of the project whenever significant changes arise

project.title: Sustainable Careers for Researcher Empowerment

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.title: Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

programme.title: Reforming and enhancing the European R&I System

category.title: Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

programme.title: Developing an effective ERA talent pipeline

category.title: Topic
category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis

category.title: EU research policy /Research policies in the EU

result.title: Risk Management Plan
result.description: Risk Management Plan (RMP) to cover all risks including Operational, Financial, Business, Socio-Economic, Health & Safety and External Risks. The RMP will include the development of risk mitigation strategies and application of contingency in order to complete project and WP objectives on time and in budget. It will also include protocols if a WP leader does not deliver on time or fail to deliver a Deliverable

category.title: EU research policy /Research policies in the EU

result.title: First Draft of SECURE Research Career Framework
result.description: First draft of the RCF based on the literature reviews from WP1 and key existing policies and recommendations aimed at improving research careers and reducing precarity. This will include the integration of key policies and recommendations in the new Council Recommendations on Research Careers and the revised Charter and Code, how organisations can utilise the update to ESCO and the Competence Framework for Researchers, and other relevant legal and financial recommendations

result.title: First Draft of SECURE Tenure Track-Like Models
result.description: First draft of the TTL models based on the literature reviews from WP1 and key existing policies and recommendations on TTL models. This will include selecting a range of best practices covering different TTL models and conducting in-depth interviews with selected candidates focusing on the legal, financial, and administrative implementation of these TTL models as well as the challenges faced and lessons learned

result.title: Dissemination and Communication Plan
result.description: Dissemination and Communication plan, including a comprehensive communication strategy, including objectives of communication, which will raise the awareness of the project and disseminate project goals, progress, and final results to target stakeholders who can directly benefit from the project (RPO, RFO, Industry, NGO, Policy, Civil Society). D&C activities are carried out throughout the duration of the project. The D&C plan will be updated over the course of the project whenever significant changes arise

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.title: Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

category.title: Topic
category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis

result.title: Report on the Activities of 2022 ERN
result.description: Report on the Activities of all the 2022 ERNs including 15 Photos at high resolution of the 2022 ERN a video documenting all the events and activities of the 2022 ERNs and the list of MSCA fellows who collaborate to the ERN in 2022
